short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gets stuff from HTML as string

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mewate allows an user to be able to grab text or regex patterns of texts from either the page source or the network calls. Why would one want to do this? If you wanted to know how many images exist on a page. If you wanted to know what domains the page is using or pulling from. If the page is obfuscating a file or media you want direct access to. This would help with all of that.

version 1.2
- Fixed variable setting for XHR pattern
version 1.1
- Fixed how default values were set in storage but not shown in popup menu.
- Updated how events are handled so that even in pages with chrome:// url's (extensions page, for example), the popup menu should still function.
- Updated so any input in popup menu fields should highlight the save button to make it known to the users that manual changes requires a save to persist.
